pageContext.title: My way to style!
pageContext.content: Always when you start a new project need to choose a few standards for the new app. One of them is the way how you gonna be implementing style for your components. There is plenty of methods to do that but this time I would like to tell you about one - how I do this most often. This is about styled-components.
